detectors.description:
Reentrancy in ChiTrader.setup(uint256,uint256) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#78-89):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(is_empty()) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#79)
		- (now - cooldown_start_time > 3600) && (this.balance == 0) && (Chi.balanceOf(this) == 0) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#73)
	- require(bool)(Chi.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= chi_amount) (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#80)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- Amount_of_Chi_for_One_ETH = 1000000000000000000 / price_in_wei (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#85)
	- Chi_available = chi_amount (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#84)
	- price = price_in_wei (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#83)
	- seller = msg.sender (../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#86)
detectors.markdown:
Reentrancy in [ChiTrader.setup(uint256,uint256)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L78-L89):
	External calls:
	- [require(bool)(is_empty())](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L79)
		- [(now - cooldown_start_time > 3600) && (this.balance == 0) && (Chi.balanceOf(this) == 0)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L73)
	- [require(bool)(Chi.allowance(msg.sender,this) >= chi_amount)](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L80)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- [Amount_of_Chi_for_One_ETH = 1000000000000000000 / price_in_wei](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L85)
	- [Chi_available = chi_amount](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L84)
	- [price = price_in_wei](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L83)
	- [seller = msg.sender](../../../Desktop/mainnet/02/02cf57be43971ce5446f7893d9a73d3571976e06_ChiTrader.sol#L86)
